items.sentence: Tom noticed Mary\'s bracelet on her desk and wondered why she wasn\'t wearing it.
Tom promised Mary that he\'d pay back all the money that he\'d borrowed from her.
You don\'t have to paint the kitchen yellow. You can paint it any color you want.
Sooner or later someone will have to tell Tom and Mary that they have to do that.
Tom and Mary paddled their canoe along the shoreline, looking of a place to camp.
